title: I invalidated my prayer but don't remember if it was dhur or asr, repeated dhur, valid?
transcript: Anis from Canada uh so when I was uh once doing a prayer and I uh you know and I did something which I asked later that uh the thing that I did in prayer was invalid I didn't remember which prayer it was uh either or so I did it again with an intention of what's the ruling if you are certain that this action invalidated your prayer and you thought most likely it is and you prayed that's all what you have to do you don't need anything else
